DOC.detailed_description: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) oppositional defiant disorder ( ODD ) common childhood behavior disorder . Children ADHD experience hyperactivity , distractibility , poor concentration , impulsivity . If leave untreated , ADHD continue adulthood , cause problem family , social , work environment . Children ODD exhibit ongoing pattern uncooperative , defiant , hostile behavior toward authority figure . Symptoms ODD , include frequent temper tantrum , anger , resentment , vindictiveness , may interfere child 's everyday functioning . The Incredible Years parent train program show effective multiple setting train parent manage child 's behavior . This study evaluate effectiveness Incredible Years train program within pediatric office set improve parent skill reduce behavioral symptom young child risk develop childhood behavior disorder . Participants open-label study randomly assign Incredible Years train program waitlist condition , begin program 1-year wait period . Parent training session take place per week 10 week , last approximately 2 hour . Sessions focus teach positive parenting skill , appropriate play use praise reward , well limit-setting technique , ignore , allow child experience natural consequence action , assign time-out . Self-report assessment phone interview use assess outcomes . Additionally , follow-up visit occur immediately post-intervention 6 12 month post-intervention . Children attend one visit program begin , well follow-ups hold immediately post-intervention 12 month post-intervention . These visit include videotaped observation child primary caregiver .
